# BlueSky API Post Creator for StreamerBot


# Setup Instructions
1. Go to StreamerBot and import the string below.
2. Open the Action that is imported.
3. Edit the `bskyHandle` variable with your full BlueSky handle (eg. user.bsky.social)
4. Login to Bluesky and go to Settings > App Passwords
5. Create an App Password.
6. Edit the `bskyAppPass` variable and paste the App Password you created.

Next time you go live, your Bluesky will have a new post that looks something like this.

> Testing API Posts via Streamer.bot
> 
> Checking out the Mandragora demo - Music by Christos Antoniou of SepticFlesh
> 
> [twitch.tv/hyp3rstrike](twitch.tv/hyp3rstrike)

# Import Code w/ Pre-setup Action

